articles.title: Harness engineering: leveraging Codex in an agent-first world
articles.summary: By Ryan Lopopolo, Member of the Technical Staff

articles.title: Bringing ChatGPT to GenAI.mil
articles.summary: OpenAI for Government announces the deployment of a custom ChatGPT on GenAI.mil, bringing secure, safety-forward AI to U.S. defense teams.

articles.title: Testing ads in ChatGPT
articles.summary: OpenAI begins testing ads in ChatGPT to support free access, with clear labeling, answer independence, strong privacy protections, and user control.

articles.title: Making AI work for everyone, everywhere: our approach to localization
articles.summary: OpenAI shares its approach to AI localization, showing how globally shared frontier models can be adapted to local languages, laws, and cultures without compromising safety.

articles.title: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis
articles.summary: An autonomous lab combining OpenAI’s GPT-5 with Ginkgo Bioworks’ cloud automation cut cell-free protein synthesis costs by 40% through closed-loop experimentation.

articles.title: Introducing Trusted Access for Cyber
articles.summary: OpenAI introduces Trusted Access for Cyber, a trust-based framework that expands access to frontier cyber capabilities while strengthening safeguards against misuse.
